Package DrawManager

Class DrawManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • DrawManager.DrawManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class DrawManager
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class that handles drawing from user. Drawing is done by drag and drop. Shapes are saved in a SquareImage object. This can be saved and loaded to file. All edits will be tracked in a history.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
